meanings.definition: A salt or ester of salicylic acid.
meanings.sent1: I take a salicylate to help with my headache.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a salicylate for my joint pain.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chemistry student carry a bag of salicylate to the party? In case of an acid spill!
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening is like a salicylate, nurturing and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The bright white crystals of salicylate sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of compounds derived from salicylic acid.
meanings.sent1: The skincare product contains a salicylate for acne treatment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of different salicylates on plant growth.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tree refuse to share its salicylate? It was too protective of its leaves!
meanings.sent4: His ideas were a mix of creativity, like various salicylates blending together.
meanings.sent5: The laboratory was filled with the distinct smell of salicylate compounds.
